graphic.title: Branding & Design

list.three: Design for print and digital communication
list.four: UI/UX design for web and mobile

graphic.brandLogoQuestion: Are <fuchsia>branding</fuchsia> and <cyan>logo design</cyan> the same thing?
graphic.brandAnswer:
Branding – or visual identity – is the strategy behind building a coherent and memorable brand that represents a person or a business and makes it recognisable in the market.

A good strategy defines what the brand is, but also what it is not.

brandList.four_description: Logo, typography, colour palette and tone of voice

graphic.description:
A logo is a symbol: it represents the brand, but it is not the brand.

A logo works only when it sits within a coherent visual identity, with deliberate choices around colour, typography, tone and applications.

logoList.symbolDesc: The core shape of the logo: iconic, distinctive and functional.
logoList.typographyDesc: Type choices crafted to express character and personality.
logoList.colourDesc: Coherent colours that ensure recognition and readability everywhere.
logoList.usageDesc: Usage rules that keep the logo strong across digital and print.

UX.title: Workflow combining UI design and modern front-end development
UX.description: I create intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences with clean interfaces and smooth interactions. My approach combines creative thinking and attention to usability, designing every element with the end-user in mind.

WebDevelopment.title: Building modern and high-performance web apps and websites
WebDevelopment.description: I develop websites and applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js. I focus on clean code, optimal performance, and scalability, creating solutions that work seamlessly on every device.

BrandIdentity.title: Designing coherent and memorable visual identities
BrandIdentity.description: I craft complete brand identities, from visual strategy to material design, ensuring consistency across logos, typography, colours, and tone of voice. The goal is to build brands that are recognisable and stand out in their market.

privacy.data_description: This website does not collect or archive personal data from users. Email or phone contacts are voluntary and considered an explicit consent to respond to requests.
privacy.cookie_description: This website uses exclusively local technical tools for user preferences, such as light/dark theme. No profiling or tracking cookies are used.
privacy.finality_description: The data provided voluntarily is used exclusively for responding to user requests and is not shared with third parties.
